arm_group.description: Exposure to basic salsify puree during E1-E8
Exposure to salty salsify puree during E1-E8
Exposure to nutmeg-flavored salsify puree during E1-E8

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to understand the formation of food preferences from an early age.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Learning on Vegetable Acceptance by Toddlers

detailed_description.textblock:
The main purpose of this research is to compare the effectiveness of two mechanisms (mere
      exposure, flavour-flavour learning) in the short and medium term (up to six months after the
      learning phase) on 2-3 year-old children's vegetable acceptance. the research is conducted
      on children aged 2 to 3 years in daycares.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  children between 2 and 3 years,

          -  attending daycares

          -  returned signed consent form parents

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  children with food allergies or manifestations, chronic disease

          -  or being preterm (<36 weeks gestational age at birth)

study_pop.textblock: Children 2-3 years olds attending nurseries in Dijon city

clinical_study.official_title: Learning Mechanisms of Food Preferences in 2-3 y. o. Toddlers in Nurseries

other_outcome.description: Measure of salsify puree intake and liking by toddlers at lunch, during the exposure phase
other_outcome.time_frame: exposure period: 4 weeks, twice a week

other_outcome.description: Measure of salsify and carrot puree intake and liking by toddlers at lunch, one week after the exposure phase
other_outcome.time_frame: Measure at post-exposure one week after the end of the experimental manipulation (i.e. exposure phase)

other_outcome.description: Measure of salsify intake and liking by toddlers at lunch, at follow-up one month after the exposure phase
other_outcome.time_frame: 1-month follow-up, conducted one month after the end of the experimental manipulation (i.e. exposure phase)

other_outcome.description: Measure of salsify and carrot puree intake and liking by toddlers at lunch, at follow-up three months after the exposure phase
other_outcome.time_frame: 3-month follow-up conducted three months after the end of the experimental manipulation (i.e. exposure phase)

other_outcome.description: Measure of salsify and carrot puree intake and liking by toddlers at lunch, at follow-up six months after the exposure phase
other_outcome.time_frame: 6-month follow-up conducted six months after the end of the experimental manipulation (i.e. exposure phase)

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline = Pre-exposure at one week before the beginning of the experimental manipulation (i.e. exposure phase)
